data.name: Loop Grow
data.detailed_description:
Welcome in Loop Grow


Loop Grow is a psychological horror based in an infinite looping house where you lose your mind more and more everytime you go through a layer.

Contant Growing of the room


The room is constantly growing and the deeper you go less sanity you have, earch layer is going more in depth about the mental state of the character and making earch layer an original experience.

Full language Support !


Full language support in-game for :
-English
-French
-Japanese
And more to come !

Reality Lightning with High Density Voxel graphics


The game offer a beatifull use of the famous game engine Unreal Engine 5 using Lumen and Nanite to use the best of what Voxel graphics can offer !

data.short_description: Loop Grow is an Psychological Horror based in a layer based growing loop of different environments and mysteries.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit and better
  • Processor: 4 core processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High speeed sotrarage recommanded
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 8 core processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6Go
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High speeed sotrarage recommanded
